nodes.name: _deaffiliate

addFirstMember(address,address,address).details: Fails if `validator` has not set their affiliation to this account.Fails if the group has > 0 members.

params.greater: The address of the group that has received more votes than this group.
params.lesser: The address of the group that has received fewer votes than this group.
params.validator: The validator to add to the group

addMember(address).details: Fails if `validator` has not set their affiliation to this account.Fails if the group has zero members.

params.validator: The validator to add to the group

affiliate(address).details: De-affiliates with the previously affiliated group if present.

params.group: The validator group with which to affiliate.

params.blsKey: The BLS public key that the validator is using for consensus, should pass proof  of possession. 48 bytes.
params.blsPop: The BLS public key proof-of-possession, which consists of a signature on the  account address. 96 bytes.
params.sender: The address signed by the BLS key to generate the proof of possession.

deaffiliate().details: Fails if the account is not a validator with non-zero affiliation.

deregisterValidator(uint256).details: Fails if the account is not a validator.Fails if the validator has been a member of a group too recently.

params.index: The index of this validator in the list of all registered validators.

deregisterValidatorGroup(uint256).details: Fails if the account is not a validator group with no members.Fails if the group has had members too recently.

params.index: The index of this validator group in the list of all validator groups.

params.maxPayment: The maximum payment to the validator. Actual payment is based on score and  group commission.
params.signer: The validator signer of the account to distribute the epoch payment to.

distributeEpochPaymentsFromSigner(addres.return: The total payment paid to the validator and their group.

fractionMulExp(uint256,uint256,uint256,u.return: numerator/denominator of the computed quantity (not reduced).

params.account: The account that may have to meet locked gold balance requirements.

getAccountLockedGoldRequirement(address).return: The current locked gold balance requirement for the supplied account.

getEpochSize().return: The current epoch size in blocks.

getGroupLockedGoldRequirements().return: The Locked Gold requirements for validator groups.

params.account: The address of the validator group.

getGroupNumMembers(address).return: The number of members in a validator group.

params.accounts: The addresses of the validator groups.

getGroupsNumMembers(address[]).return: The number of members in the provided validator groups.

getMaxGroupSize().return: The maximum number of members a group can add.

params.account: The validator whose membership history to return.

getMembershipHistory(address).return: The group membership history of a validator.

params.account: The account whose group membership should be returned.

getMembershipInLastEpoch(address).return: The group that `account` was a member of at the end of the last epoch.

params.signer: The signer of the account whose group membership should be returned.

getMembershipInLastEpochFromSigner(addre.return: The group that `account` was a member of at the end of the last epoch.

getRegisteredValidatorGroups().return: The list of registered validator group addresses.

getRegisteredValidatorSigners().return: The list of signers for registered validator accounts.

getRegisteredValidators().return: The list of registered validator accounts.

params.account: The address of the validator group.
params.n: The number of members to return.

getTopGroupValidators(address,uint256).return: The top n group members for a particular group.

params.account: The account that registered the validator.

params.signer: The account that registered the validator or its authorized signing address.

params.account: The account that registered the validator group.

getValidatorLockedGoldRequirements().return: The Locked Gold requirements for validators.

getValidatorScoreParameters().return: The parameters that goven how a validator's score is calculated.

params._membershipHistoryLength: The max number of entries for validator membership history.
params.groupRequirementDuration: The Locked Gold requirement duration for groups.
params.groupRequirementValue: The Locked Gold requirement amount for groups.
params.registryAddress: The address of the registry contract.
params.validatorRequirementDuration: The Locked Gold requirement duration for validators.
params.validatorRequirementValue: The Locked Gold requirement amount for validators.
params.validatorScoreAdjustmentSpeed: The speed at which validator scores are adjusted.
params.validatorScoreExponent: The exponent used in calculating validator scores.

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

isValidator(address).return: Whether a particular address is a registered validator.

isValidatorGroup(address).return: Whether a particular address is a registered validator group.

meetsAccountLockedGoldRequirements(addre.return: Whether or not an account meets its Locked Gold requirements.

numberValidatorsInCurrentSet().return: Size of the current elected validator set.

registerValidator(bytes,bytes,bytes).details: Fails if the account is already a validator or validator group.Fails if the account does not have sufficient Locked Gold.

params.blsPop: The BLS public key proof-of-possession, which consists of a signature on the  account address. 48 bytes.
params.blsPublicKey: The BLS public key that the validator is using for consensus, should pass  proof of possession. 96 bytes.
params.ecdsaPublicKey: The ECDSA public key that the validator is using for consensus, should  match the validator signer. 64 bytes.

registerValidatorGroup(uint256).details: Fails if the account is already a validator or validator group.Fails if the account does not have sufficient weight.

params.commission: Fixidity representation of the commission this group receives on epoch  payments made to its members.

removeMember(address).details: Fails if `validator` is not a member of the account's group.

params.validator: The validator to remove from the group

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

reorderMember(address,address,address).details: Fails if `validator` is not a member of the account's validator group.

params.greaterMember: The member who will be ahead of `validator`, or 0 if `validator` will be  the first member.
params.lesserMember: The member who will be behind `validator`, or 0 if `validator` will be the  last member.

params.duration: The time (in seconds) that these requirements persist for.
params.value: The per-member amount of Locked Gold required.

params.length: The number of validator group membership entries to store.

params.registryAddress: The address of a registry contract for routing to other contracts.

params.duration: The time (in seconds) that these requirements persist for.
params.value: The amount of Locked Gold required.

params.adjustmentSpeed: The speed at which the score is adjusted.
params.exponent: The exponent used in calculating the score.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

params.blsPop: The BLS public key proof-of-possession, which consists of a signature on the  account address. 48 bytes.
params.blsPublicKey: The BLS public key that the validator is using for consensus, should pass  proof of possession. 48 bytes.

params.commission: Fixidity representation of the commission this group receives on epoch  payments made to its members. Must be in the range [0, 1.0].

params.account: The address under which the validator is registered.
params.ecdsaPublicKey: The ECDSA public key corresponding to `signer`.
params.signer: The address which the validator is using to sign consensus messages.
The validator signer of the validator account whose score needs updating.
params.uptime: The Fixidity representation of the validator's uptime, between 0 and 1.

params.index: Index of requested validator in the validator set as sorted by the election.

validatorAddressFromCurrentSet(uint256).return: Address of validator at the requested index.

devdoc.title: A contract for registering and electing Validator Groups and Validators.

addFirstMember(address,address,address).notice: Adds the first member to a group's list of members and marks it eligible for election.

addMember(address).notice: Adds a member to the end of a validator group's list of members.

affiliate(address).notice: Affiliates a validator with a group, allowing it to be added as a member.

checkProofOfPossession(address,bytes,byt.notice: Checks a BLS proof of possession.

deaffiliate().notice: De-affiliates a validator, removing it from the group for which it is a member.

distributeEpochPaymentsFromSigner(addres.notice: Distributes epoch payments to the account associated with `signer` and its group.

fractionMulExp(uint256,uint256,uint256,u.notice: calculate a * b^x for fractions a, b to `decimals` precision

getAccountLockedGoldRequirement(address).notice: Returns the current locked gold balance requirement for the supplied account.

getEpochSize().notice: Returns the current epoch size in blocks.

getGroupLockedGoldRequirements().notice: Returns the Locked Gold requirements for validator groups.

getGroupNumMembers(address).notice: Returns the number of members in a validator group.

getGroupsNumMembers(address[]).notice: Returns the number of members in the provided validator groups.

getMaxGroupSize().notice: Returns the maximum number of members a group can add.

getMembershipHistory(address).notice: Returns the group membership history of a validator.

getMembershipInLastEpoch(address).notice: Returns the group that `account` was a member of at the end of the last epoch.

getMembershipInLastEpochFromSigner(addre.notice: Returns the group that `account` was a member of at the end of the last epoch.

getNumRegisteredValidators().notice: Returns the number of registered validators.

getRegisteredValidatorGroups().notice: Returns the list of registered validator group accounts.

getRegisteredValidatorSigners().notice: Returns the list of signers for the registered validator accounts.

getRegisteredValidators().notice: Returns the list of registered validator accounts.

getTopGroupValidators(address,uint256).notice: Returns the top n group members for a particular group.

getValidatorLockedGoldRequirements().notice: Returns the Locked Gold requirements for validators.

getValidatorScoreParameters().notice: Returns the parameters that goven how a validator's score is calculated.

isValidator(address).notice: Returns whether a particular account has a registered validator.

isValidatorGroup(address).notice: Returns whether a particular account has a registered validator group.

meetsAccountLockedGoldRequirements(addre.notice: Returns whether or not an account meets its Locked Gold requirements.

numberValidatorsInCurrentSet().notice: Gets the size of the current elected validator set.

registerValidator(bytes,bytes,bytes).notice: Registers a validator unaffiliated with any validator group.

registerValidatorGroup(uint256).notice: Registers a validator group with no member validators.

removeMember(address).notice: Removes a member from a validator group.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

reorderMember(address,address,address).notice: Reorders a member within a validator group.

setGroupLockedGoldRequirements(uint256,u.notice: Updates the Locked Gold requirements for Validator Groups.

setMaxGroupSize(uint256).notice: Updates the maximum number of members a group can have.

setMembershipHistoryLength(uint256).notice: Updates the number of validator group membership entries to store.

setRegistry(address).notice: Updates the address pointing to a Registry contract.

setValidatorLockedGoldRequirements(uint2.notice: Updates the Locked Gold requirements for Validators.

updateValidatorScoreFromSigner(address,u.notice: Updates a validator's score based on its uptime for the epoch.

validatorAddressFromCurrentSet(uint256).notice: Gets a validator address from the current validator set.
